2.text: Q: How important is your phone to you?

5.text: My phone is important to me because I have children, so their school can always get in touch with me.

12.text: Also, if I'm in an awkward situation I can use my phone - I'll play a game or something!

20.text: Q: Who do you spend the longest on the phone with?

23.text: My sister Nicole - we speak at least once a day. At the very least!

31.text: Q: Who do you gossip most with on the phone?

34.text: Kate Thornton is amazing to chat to. We can talk for hours.

38.text: Q: What photos will you never delete?

41.text: Pictures of my kids, my dog and my husband.

45.text: Q: What was your last Facebook update?

48.text: 'Nothing like an early morning run on a beautiful autumn day'

53.text: Q: What's the first thing you check on your phone in the morning?

57.text: The weather! That's really boring, but, you know...

61.text: Q: What's the most embarrassing thing on your phone?

64.text: I get embarrassing things sent to me, but I delete them all just in case they end up

69.text: on my TV, or the kids see them!

74.text: I get rid of them as soon as possible...

77.text: But right now it's a picture of some dim sum I ordered that looks like lady parts!

83.text: Q: What's the last video you watched on your phone?

87.text: My dog, humping my other dog.
